name: Brownian Blitz
description:
A simple game about dodging and destroying balls that replicate whenever they bounce off a wall. 

The past few times I've tried to participate in a game jam, I failed to complete the game in time due to going  a bit overboard (especially considering my limited experience with game dev), so this time I just focused on doing something simple. I may have ended up making it a bit too simple, but frankly I'm just happy to have gotten something out.

(WASD or the arrow keys to move)
